item.title: 【Requests】[REQ VID] - Beyoncé live at Wembley AI upscale
item.description:
Is it possible for someone to upscale Beyoncé's live at Wembley concert? I tried doing it myself, I even liked the results but it is simply unattainable to do it with my PC (I tried upscaling one half of a song to 720p and it took the whole night and only half of the work was done by then)
I can provide the file converted to h265 deinterlaced if needed (or the original 480i from DVD if the results are better)

Thanks a lot!

PS: There is an upscale in this topic with a rather annoying watermark (https://sharemania.us/threads/beyoncé-live-at-wembley-4k-upscale.195314/), so if someone could do it without watermarking the file, I would be thankful
item.author: RFL
